description:
Yajima returns while the puzzled Risako and Kouichi try to keep the secret of Yajima`s so - called death. But behind the seemingly good comeback, Yajima reveals himslef to be the pilot of Apparition, one of Katou`s new Machinas before the rest of JUDA during their party and kidnaps Kizaki as a mission from Katou.
Source: crunchyroll
